content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #87992 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

I'm not too sure about this one, I would assign a P-medium but I'm happy to receive more opinions.

It is unclear to me how this linking configuration is common (also looking at the linked #82972) and the impact in terms of number of people affected - in this specific case (iiuc) a crate should receive symbols from a dependency hyper that is dynamically linked
